fast.title: Fast and free

free.title: No registration
free.desc: No account required. Use any tool immediately, with no limits.

merge-pdf.name: Merge PDF
merge-pdf.description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document

seo.title: Free Online PDF Merger
seo.content: Merge multiple PDF files into one document directly in your browser. Drag and drop to reorder pages, combine contracts, reports or any PDFs. Free, private, and no registration required.

faq.q1: How many PDF files can I merge at once?
faq.a1: There is no fixed limit. You can add as many PDF files as you need. All processing happens in your browser, so performance depends on your device and total file size.
faq.q2: Can I reorder the files before merging?
faq.a2: Yes, you can drag and drop to rearrange the order of files before merging. Use the move up and move down buttons for precise control.
faq.q3: Does merging affect the quality of my PDFs?
faq.a3: No. The merge process combines the original pages without any recompression. Your content, images, and formatting remain exactly as they were.

ui.dropzone: Drop PDF files here or click to select
ui.dropzoneHint: You can add multiple PDF files
ui.invalidPdf: Invalid PDF file. Please select a valid PDF.
ui.mergeError: An error occurred while merging. Please try again.

split-pdf.name: Split PDF
split-pdf.description: Split a PDF into multiple separate files

seo.title: Free Online PDF Splitter
seo.content: Split PDF files into individual pages or custom page ranges. Extract specific pages from large documents easily. Everything runs in your browser — your files stay private.

faq.q1: Can I extract specific pages from a PDF?
faq.a1: Yes, you can split every page into a separate file or specify custom page ranges like 1-3, 5, 8-10 to extract only the pages you need.
faq.q2: What happens to the original PDF?
faq.a2: The original file is not modified. The tool creates new PDF files from the pages you select, leaving the source document intact.
faq.a3: There is no hard limit. The tool processes PDFs of any size directly in your browser. Very large documents may take a bit longer depending on your device.

ui.dropzone: Drop a PDF file here or click to select
ui.rangeHint: Enter page numbers or ranges separated by commas
ui.invalidPdf: Invalid PDF file. Please select a valid PDF.
ui.splitError: An error occurred while splitting. Please try again.
ui.invalidRange: Invalid page range. Please check your input.

compress-pdf.name: Compress PDF
compress-pdf.description: Reduce PDF file size while maintaining quality

seo.title: Free Online PDF Compressor
seo.content: Compress PDF files to reduce their size while preserving quality. Perfect for email attachments and uploads. Works entirely in your browser — no data is sent to any server.

faq.q1: How much can the file size be reduced?
faq.a1: Compression results vary depending on the PDF content. Documents with many images typically see the largest reductions, often 50-80% smaller. Text-heavy PDFs may see smaller reductions.
faq.q2: Does compression reduce the quality of my PDF?
faq.a2: The tool uses smart compression that targets embedded images while preserving text sharpness. The result is visually very close to the original in most cases.
faq.a3: Password-protected PDFs need to be unlocked first. Use our Unlock PDF tool to remove the protection, then compress the file.

ui.dropzone: Drop a PDF file here or click to select
ui.noReduction: File is already optimized, no further reduction possible.
ui.invalidPdf: Invalid PDF file. Please select a valid PDF.
ui.compressError: An error occurred while compressing. Please try again.

pdf-to-jpg.name: PDF to JPG
pdf-to-jpg.description: Convert PDF pages to JPG images

seo.title: Free Online PDF to JPG Converter
seo.content: Convert PDF pages to high-quality JPG images. Choose the output quality and download individual pages or all at once. Runs entirely in your browser with full privacy.

faq.q1: Can I convert specific pages to JPG?
faq.a1: The tool converts all pages in the PDF to individual JPG images. You can then download only the pages you need.
faq.q2: What quality settings are available?
faq.a2: You can adjust the output quality from low to high. Higher quality produces sharper images with larger file sizes, while lower quality creates smaller files.
faq.q3: Is there a page limit for conversion?
faq.a3: There is no page limit. The tool processes all pages in your PDF. Larger documents may take longer to convert, depending on your device.

ui.dropzone: Drop a PDF file here or click to select
ui.dropzoneHint: Select a PDF to convert to JPG
ui.convertError: An error occurred during conversion. Please try again.

jpg-to-pdf.name: JPG to PDF
jpg-to-pdf.description: Convert JPG images to a PDF document

seo.title: Free Online JPG to PDF Converter
seo.content: Convert one or multiple JPG images into a single PDF document. Reorder images before converting. Fast, free, and processed entirely in your browser.

faq.q1: Can I combine multiple JPG images into one PDF?
faq.a1: Yes, you can add as many JPG images as you need. Each image becomes a page in the resulting PDF. Drag to reorder them before converting.
faq.q2: Does the conversion preserve image quality?
faq.a2: Yes, images are embedded in the PDF at their original resolution. No additional compression is applied during the conversion.
faq.a3: This tool accepts JPG and JPEG files. For other formats like PNG, use our Images to PDF tool instead.

ui.dropzone: Drop JPG images here or click to select
ui.dropzoneHint: You can add multiple JPG images
ui.convertError: An error occurred during conversion. Please try again.

rotate-pdf.name: Rotate PDF
rotate-pdf.description: Rotate pages of a PDF document

seo.title: Free Online PDF Page Rotator
seo.content: Rotate PDF pages by 90, 180, or 270 degrees. Apply rotation to all pages or select specific ones. Works directly in your browser with no uploads to external servers.

faq.q1: Can I rotate only specific pages?
faq.a1: Yes, you can choose to rotate all pages at once or specify individual pages and ranges. For example, enter 1, 3, 5-8 to rotate only those pages.
faq.q2: What rotation angles are available?
faq.a2: You can rotate pages by 90 degrees (clockwise), 180 degrees (upside down), or 270 degrees (counter-clockwise).
faq.q3: Does rotation affect the PDF content?
faq.a3: No. Rotation only changes the page orientation. All text, images, and formatting within the pages remain exactly as they were.

ui.dropzone: Drop a PDF file here or click to select
ui.pagesHint: Enter page numbers or ranges separated by commas
ui.invalidPdf: Invalid PDF file. Please select a valid PDF.
ui.rotateError: An error occurred while rotating. Please try again.
ui.invalidRange: Invalid page range. Please check your input.

pdf-to-word.name: PDF to Word
pdf-to-word.description: Convert PDF documents to editable Word files

seo.title: Free Online PDF to Word Converter
seo.content: Convert PDF files to editable Word documents directly in your browser. Extract text and formatting from PDFs into DOCX format. Free, private, no upload needed.

faq.q1: How does PDF to Word conversion work?
faq.a1: The tool extracts text content from each PDF page and reconstructs it as a Word document with paragraphs and headings preserved. Processing happens entirely in your browser.
faq.q2: Will the formatting be preserved?
faq.a2: Basic text formatting, headings, and paragraph structure are preserved. Complex layouts, images, and advanced formatting may require manual adjustment after conversion.
faq.a3: The tool accepts PDF files and outputs DOCX format compatible with Microsoft Word, Google Docs, and LibreOffice.

ui.dropzone: Drop a PDF file here or click to select
ui.convertError: An error occurred during conversion. Please try again.

seo.title: Free Online Word to PDF Converter
seo.content: Convert Word documents (DOCX, DOC) to PDF directly in your browser. Preserve formatting and layout. Free, private, no upload needed.

faq.a1: The tool supports DOCX files (Microsoft Word 2007+). DOC files (older format) have limited support. For best results, use DOCX format.
faq.q2: Will the formatting be preserved?
faq.a2: Text content, headings, paragraphs, lists, and tables are converted. Some complex formatting like custom fonts or embedded objects may appear differently.
faq.q3: Is there a file size limit?
faq.a3: The tool supports Word files up to 50 MB. All processing happens in your browser — your files are never uploaded to any server.

ui.dropzone: Drop a Word file here or click to select
ui.dropzoneHint: DOCX and DOC files up to 50 MB
ui.convertError: An error occurred during conversion. Please try again.
ui.printHint: Click Download PDF and select 'Save as PDF' in the print dialog.

pdf-to-png.name: PDF to PNG
pdf-to-png.description: Convert PDF pages to high-quality PNG images

seo.title: Free Online PDF to PNG Converter
seo.content: Convert PDF pages to high-quality PNG images directly in your browser. Choose resolution scale, enable transparency. Free, private, no upload needed.

faq.q1: What resolution will the PNG images be?
faq.a1: You can choose from 1x to 4x scale. At 2x (default), a standard A4 page produces approximately 1654x2339 pixel images. Higher scale means better quality but larger files.
faq.q2: Can I get transparent PNG images?
faq.a2: Yes! Enable the transparency option to get PNG images with a transparent background instead of white. This is useful for overlaying PDF content on other designs.
faq.q3: How many pages can I convert?
faq.a3: There is no page limit. All pages in your PDF will be converted to individual PNG images. Processing happens in your browser, so very large documents may take longer.

ui.dropzone: Drop a PDF file here or click to select
ui.convertError: An error occurred during conversion. Please try again.

unlock-pdf.name: Unlock PDF
unlock-pdf.description: Remove password protection from PDF files

seo.title: Free Online PDF Unlocker
seo.content: Remove password protection from PDF files directly in your browser. Unlock PDFs to enable editing, printing, and copying. Free, private, no upload needed.

faq.q1: What types of PDF protection can be removed?
faq.a1: The tool can remove both user passwords (required to open the PDF) and owner passwords (that restrict editing, printing, or copying). You must know the password to unlock the file.
faq.q2: Is this legal to use?
faq.a2: Yes, as long as you have the right to access the PDF. This tool is designed for users who know the password but want to remove it for convenience. Never use it on files you do not own.
faq.q3: Will the PDF content be changed?
faq.a3: No. The tool only removes the password protection. All content, formatting, images, and metadata remain exactly the same.

ui.dropzone: Drop a protected PDF here or click to select
ui.passwordHint: Leave empty if the PDF only has editing restrictions
ui.wrongPassword: Incorrect password. Please check and try again.
ui.unlockError: An error occurred while unlocking. Please try again.

images-to-pdf.name: Images to PDF
images-to-pdf.description: Convert multiple images into a single PDF document

seo.title: Free Online Images to PDF Converter
seo.content: Convert multiple images (JPG, PNG, WebP) into a single PDF document. Reorder pages, choose page size, add margins. Free, private, no upload needed.

faq.a1: You can use JPG, PNG, and WebP images. All formats are supported and can be mixed in the same PDF document.
faq.q2: Can I reorder the images?
faq.a2: Yes! After uploading, you can reorder images using the up/down arrows. The final PDF will follow the order you set.
faq.a3: Choose from Fit to Image (each page matches the image size), A4, or Letter. You can also add margins (none, small, medium, large).

ui.dropzone: Drop images here or click to select
ui.dropzoneHint: JPG, PNG, WebP — multiple files supported

pdf-editor.name: PDF Editor
pdf-editor.description: Edit, annotate and sign your PDF documents

compress-image.name: Compress Image
compress-image.description: Reduce image file size without losing quality

seo.title: Free Online Image Compressor
seo.content: Compress JPG, PNG and WebP images directly in your browser. Reduce file size while maintaining visual quality. Free, no upload needed — your files stay private.

faq.q1: What image formats can I compress?
faq.a1: You can compress JPG, PNG and WebP images. The tool processes files directly in your browser using advanced compression algorithms.
faq.q2: Will compression reduce image quality?
faq.a2: You control the quality with a slider. Higher quality means larger files, lower quality means smaller files. The default setting provides an excellent balance.
faq.q3: Is there a file size limit?
faq.a3: The tool supports images up to 50 MB. All processing happens in your browser, so larger files may take longer on slower devices.

ui.dropzone: Drop an image here or click to select
ui.error: Compression failed. Please try again with a different image.

resize-image.name: Resize Image
resize-image.description: Change the dimensions of your images

seo.title: Free Online Image Resizer
seo.content: Resize JPG, PNG and WebP images to any dimension. Lock aspect ratio, use percentage presets, or enter custom sizes. Free and processed entirely in your browser.

faq.q1: Can I maintain the aspect ratio while resizing?
faq.a1: Yes, the aspect ratio lock is enabled by default. When you change width or height, the other dimension adjusts automatically to keep proportions.
faq.q2: What are the percentage presets?
faq.a2: Quick presets let you resize to 25%, 50%, 75%, 150% or 200% of the original size with one click.
faq.a3: The tool uses high-quality bicubic interpolation. Enlarging images beyond the original size may reduce sharpness, while reducing size maintains quality.

ui.dropzone: Drop an image here or click to select
ui.error: Resizing failed. Please try again with a different image.

seo.title: Free Online Image Cropper
seo.content: Crop JPG, PNG and WebP images with a visual editor. Choose from preset aspect ratios or crop freely. No upload required — works entirely in your browser.

faq.q1: What aspect ratio presets are available?
faq.a1: You can crop with freeform selection, or use presets: 1:1 (square), 16:9 (widescreen), 4:3 (standard), and 3:2 (photo).
faq.q2: Can I crop to an exact pixel size?
faq.a2: The visual cropper lets you drag to select any area. For exact sizes, combine this with the Resize Image tool after cropping.
faq.a3: No. The crop simply extracts the selected area at its original resolution. No recompression is applied to the cropped region.

ui.dropzone: Drop an image here or click to select
ui.error: Cropping failed. Please try again with a different image.

png-to-jpg.name: PNG to JPG
png-to-jpg.description: Convert PNG images to JPG format

seo.title: Free PNG to JPG Converter Online
seo.content: Convert PNG images to JPG format instantly in your browser. Adjustable quality, transparent areas filled with white. No upload needed — completely private.

faq.a1: JPG does not support transparency. Transparent areas in your PNG will be filled with a white background during conversion.
faq.q2: Can I control the output quality?
faq.a2: Yes, use the quality slider to balance between file size and image quality. Higher values produce better-looking but larger JPG files.
faq.a3: Images up to 50 MB are supported. The conversion happens entirely in your browser, so your files remain private.

ui.dropzone: Drop a PNG image here or click to select

jpg-to-png.name: JPG to PNG
jpg-to-png.description: Convert JPG images to PNG format with transparency

seo.title: Free JPG to PNG Converter Online
seo.content: Convert JPG images to PNG format instantly in your browser. PNG supports transparency and lossless compression. Free, private, no registration needed.

faq.a1: PNG supports transparency and lossless compression, making it ideal for logos, graphics, and images that need sharp edges without compression artifacts.
faq.q2: Will the file size increase?
faq.a2: PNG files are typically larger than JPG because PNG uses lossless compression. The trade-off is higher quality with no compression artifacts.
faq.a3: Converting JPG to PNG does not automatically add transparency. The image keeps its original content, but is now in a format that supports transparency for future edits.

webp-to-png.name: WebP to PNG
webp-to-png.description: Convert WebP images to PNG format

seo.title: Free WebP to PNG Converter Online
seo.content: Convert WebP images to PNG format instantly in your browser. Maintain transparency and quality. No upload required — your files stay on your device.

faq.a1: While WebP is great for the web, PNG is more widely supported across applications, image editors, and platforms. Converting ensures maximum compatibility.
faq.q2: Is transparency preserved?
faq.a2: Yes. If your WebP image has transparent areas, they will be preserved in the PNG output.
faq.a3: PNG files may be larger than WebP since WebP uses more aggressive compression. The quality remains identical.

webp-to-jpg.name: WebP to JPG
webp-to-jpg.description: Convert WebP images to JPG format

seo.title: Free WebP to JPG Converter Online
seo.content: Convert WebP images to JPG format instantly in your browser. Adjustable quality with white background fill for transparency. Free, private, no registration.

faq.q1: What happens to transparent areas in WebP?
faq.a1: JPG does not support transparency. Any transparent areas in the WebP image will be filled with a white background.
faq.q2: Can I adjust the JPG quality?
faq.a2: Yes, use the quality slider to set output quality from 10% to 100%. Higher values mean better quality but larger file size.
faq.a3: Yes, completely free with no limits. The conversion runs in your browser, so no data is uploaded to any server.

heic-to-jpg.name: HEIC to JPG
heic-to-jpg.description: Convert iPhone HEIC photos to JPG format

seo.title: Free HEIC to JPG Converter Online
seo.content: Convert HEIC and HEIF photos from iPhone to JPG format. Works directly in your browser with no upload needed. Free, fast and completely private.

faq.a1: HEIC (High Efficiency Image Container) is Apple's default photo format on iPhone. It offers better compression than JPG but is not universally supported.
faq.q2: Why convert HEIC to JPG?
faq.a2: JPG is universally supported across all devices, apps and platforms. Converting HEIC to JPG ensures your photos can be opened and shared everywhere.
faq.a3: The conversion uses high quality settings (92%) to minimize quality loss. The result is visually identical to the original in most cases.

ui.dropzone: Drop a HEIC/HEIF file here or click to select

svg-to-png.name: SVG to PNG
svg-to-png.description: Convert SVG vector graphics to PNG images

seo.title: Free Online SVG to PNG Converter
seo.content: Convert SVG vector graphics to high-quality PNG images in your browser. Choose scale (1x, 2x, 3x, 4x) for crisp output at any resolution. Free, private, no upload needed.

faq.a1: While SVG is ideal for web, PNG is universally supported across all applications, social media platforms, and messaging apps. Converting ensures your graphics display correctly everywhere.
faq.q2: What do the scale options mean?
faq.a2: Scale multiplies the SVG dimensions. 1x gives the original size, 2x doubles it for retina displays, and 4x creates very high-resolution output for print or large formats.
faq.a3: Yes, transparent areas in the SVG are preserved as transparency in the PNG output.

compress-video.name: Compress Video
compress-video.description: Reduce video file size while maintaining quality

seo.title: Free Online Video Compressor
seo.content: Compress video files directly in your browser. Reduce file size with adjustable quality settings using H.264 encoding. Free, private, no upload to external servers.

faq.a1: The tool supports MP4, WebM, MOV and most common video formats. The output is always MP4 (H.264) for maximum compatibility across devices and platforms.
faq.q2: How much can the file size be reduced?
faq.a2: Results vary depending on the original video. Typically you can expect 30-70% size reduction at medium quality. Higher quality preserves more detail with less compression.
faq.a3: The tool offers three quality levels. High quality preserves most detail, medium offers a good balance, and low creates the smallest files. You choose the best tradeoff for your needs.

trim-video.name: Trim Video
trim-video.description: Cut and trim your videos with precision

seo.title: Free Online Video Trimmer
seo.content: Trim and cut video files directly in your browser. Set precise start and end points with a visual preview. Free, private, no upload needed.

faq.a1: The tool supports MP4, WebM, MOV and most common video formats playable by your browser. The output is MP4 for maximum compatibility.
faq.q2: Can I preview before trimming?
faq.a2: Yes, the built-in video player lets you preview the entire video. Adjust the start and end sliders to select the portion you want to keep, and the player follows your selection.
faq.a3: There is no length limit. The tool supports videos up to 500 MB. Processing happens in your browser, so longer videos may take more time depending on your device.

seo.title: Free Online Video to GIF Converter
seo.content: Convert video clips to animated GIFs directly in your browser. Adjust FPS, width, and select the portion to convert. High-quality palette optimization. Free, private, no upload.

faq.a1: The tool supports MP4, WebM and most common video formats. Simply upload your video and select the portion you want to convert to GIF.
faq.q2: How can I control the GIF file size?
faq.a2: Use the FPS and width controls. Lower FPS (5-10) and smaller width (320px) create smaller files. Higher FPS (15-20) and larger width (640px) produce smoother, larger GIFs.
faq.a3: There is no hard limit, but GIFs are best for short clips (3-15 seconds). Longer clips create very large files. The tool supports videos up to 200 MB.

video-to-mp3.description: Extract audio from videos in MP3 format

seo.title: Free Online Video to Audio Converter
seo.content: Extract audio from video files directly in your browser. Upload MP4, WebM, or other video formats and download the audio track. Free, private, no upload to external servers.

faq.a1: The tool supports MP4, WebM, and most common video formats that your browser can play. Simply drag and drop your video file to get started.
faq.q2: What format is the extracted audio?
faq.a2: The audio is extracted as a WAV file, which is a lossless uncompressed format. WAV files are universally compatible with all audio players and editors.
faq.q3: Is there a file size limit?
faq.a3: The tool supports videos up to 500 MB. Processing happens entirely in your browser, so larger files may take longer depending on your device.

screen-recorder.name: Screen Recorder
screen-recorder.description: Record your screen directly from the browser

seo.title: Free Online Screen Recorder
seo.content: Record your screen directly from your browser. Capture your entire screen, a window, or a tab with optional audio. No software to install, no registration required.

faq.q1: Do I need to install anything?
faq.a1: No. The screen recorder uses your browsers built-in screen capture API. It works directly in the browser without any downloads or extensions.
faq.q2: Can I record audio along with the screen?
faq.a2: Yes, you can enable audio recording to capture system sounds along with your screen. Toggle the Include audio option before starting.
faq.a3: Recordings are saved in WebM format, which is supported by all modern browsers and video players. You can convert to other formats using video conversion tools.

audio-cutter.name: Audio Cutter
audio-cutter.description: Cut and trim audio files with precision

seo.title: Free Online Audio Cutter
seo.content: Cut and trim audio files directly in your browser. Visual waveform editor with precise start and end selection. Supports MP3, WAV, OGG, and more. Free, private, no upload needed.

faq.a1: The tool supports MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, AAC, and any audio format your browser can decode. The output is saved as a high-quality WAV file.
faq.q2: Can I preview before cutting?
faq.a2: Yes, use the Preview button to listen to the selected portion before cutting. Adjust the start and end points using the sliders or by typing exact times.
faq.q3: Why is the output in WAV format?
faq.a3: WAV is a lossless uncompressed format that preserves full audio quality. It ensures no quality loss during the cutting process and is compatible with all audio players.

audio-converter.name: Audio Converter
audio-converter.description: Convert audio files between different formats

seo.title: Free Online Audio Converter
seo.content: Convert audio files between MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, and AAC formats directly in your browser. High-quality conversion powered by FFmpeg. Free, private, no upload needed.

faq.a1: You can convert between MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, and AAC. The tool accepts any audio format your browser can read and outputs in your chosen format.
faq.q2: Does conversion affect audio quality?
faq.a2: Converting to lossless formats (WAV, FLAC) preserves full quality. Converting to lossy formats (MP3, OGG, AAC) uses high-quality settings to minimize any loss.
faq.q3: Is there a file size limit?
faq.a3: The tool supports audio files up to 100 MB. All processing happens in your browser using FFmpeg WebAssembly — your files are never uploaded.

voice-recorder.name: Voice Recorder
voice-recorder.description: Record your voice directly from the browser

seo.title: Free Online Voice Recorder
seo.content: Record your voice directly from your browser with no software to install. See a real-time waveform while recording. Pause, resume, and download your recordings. Free and private.

faq.a1: Yes, you need a microphone connected to your device. Most laptops and smartphones have built-in microphones. The browser will ask for permission to access it.
faq.q2: What format are recordings saved in?
faq.a2: Recordings are saved in WebM audio format, which is supported by all modern browsers and most audio players. You can convert to other formats using audio conversion tools.
faq.a3: No. The recording is processed entirely in your browser and is never uploaded to any server. Only you have access to your recordings.

word-counter.name: Word Counter
word-counter.description: Count words, characters, sentences and paragraphs

seo.title: Free Online Word Counter Tool
seo.content: Count words, characters, sentences and paragraphs in your text instantly. Our free word counter works directly in your browser with no uploads needed. Perfect for essays, articles, social media posts and any text content.

faq.q1: How does the word counter work?
faq.a1: Simply paste or type your text in the input area. The counter instantly analyzes your text and shows the number of words, characters, sentences, paragraphs, and estimated reading/speaking time.
faq.q2: Is my text stored on any server?
faq.a2: No. All processing happens directly in your browser. Your text is never uploaded or stored anywhere.
faq.q3: What is the reading time based on?
faq.a3: Reading time is estimated at 200 words per minute (average adult reading speed). Speaking time uses 130 words per minute.

ui.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...

lorem-ipsum.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
lorem-ipsum.description: Generate customizable Lorem Ipsum placeholder text

seo.title: Free Lorem Ipsum Generator
seo.content: Generate customizable Lorem Ipsum placeholder text for your designs and projects. Choose between paragraphs, sentences, or words. Copy with one click. No registration needed.

faq.a1: Lorem Ipsum is placeholder text used in the printing and typesetting industry since the 1500s. It helps designers visualize how content will look without being distracted by readable text.
faq.q2: Can I customize the output?
faq.a2: Yes, you can choose the number and type of content to generate: paragraphs, sentences, or individual words.
faq.a3: The text uses standard Lorem Ipsum vocabulary arranged in random combinations, ensuring realistic-looking placeholder content every time.

case-converter.name: Case Converter
case-converter.description: Convert text between uppercase, lowercase and other formats

diff-checker.name: Diff Checker
diff-checker.description: Compare two texts and find the differences

markdown-editor.name: Markdown Editor
markdown-editor.description: Write and preview Markdown in real time

json-formatter.name: JSON Formatter
json-formatter.description: Format, validate and minify JSON code

seo.title: Free Online JSON Formatter & Validator
seo.content: Format, validate and minify JSON data instantly in your browser. Our free JSON formatter beautifies messy JSON, validates syntax, and can minify your code. No data leaves your browser.

faq.a1: The tool will show you the exact error message if your JSON is invalid, helping you quickly find and fix syntax issues.
faq.q2: What indent sizes are supported?
faq.a2: You can choose between 2, 4, or 8 spaces for indentation when formatting your JSON.
faq.a3: Absolutely. All processing happens in your browser. Your JSON data is never sent to any server.

base64.name: Base64 Encoder
base64.description: Encode and decode text and files to Base64

seo.title: Free Online Base64 Encoder & Decoder
seo.content: Encode and decode Base64 strings instantly in your browser. Convert text to Base64 and back with our free tool. Perfect for developers working with APIs, data URIs, and encoded content.

faq.a1: Base64 is a binary-to-text encoding scheme that converts binary data into ASCII characters. It's commonly used in data URIs, email attachments, and API payloads.
faq.q2: Does it support Unicode?
faq.a2: Yes, our encoder handles Unicode characters including emojis, accented letters, and non-Latin scripts correctly.
faq.a3: There's no practical limit for text encoding/decoding. The tool works entirely in your browser.

regex-tester.name: Regex Tester
regex-tester.description: Test and debug regular expressions in real time

seo.title: Free Online Regex Tester & Debugger
seo.content: Test and debug regular expressions in real-time. See matches highlighted, capture groups, and match positions. Supports JavaScript regex syntax with global, case-insensitive, multiline, and dotAll flags.

faq.a1: The tool uses JavaScript's native RegExp engine, supporting all standard regex features including lookaheads, lookbehinds, capture groups, and named groups.
faq.q2: What do the flags mean?
faq.a2: g = global (find all matches), i = case-insensitive, m = multiline (^ and $ match line boundaries), s = dotAll (. matches newlines).
faq.q3: Is there a limit on text size?
faq.a3: There's no hard limit. Processing happens in your browser, so performance depends on your device. Complex patterns on very large texts may be slower.

color-picker.name: Color Picker
color-picker.description: Pick colors and convert between HEX, RGB, HSL

seo.title: Free Online Color Picker — HEX, RGB, HSL
seo.content: Pick any color and instantly get HEX, RGB, HSL and CSS values. Our free color picker works in your browser and lets you copy color codes with one click. Perfect for designers and developers.

faq.a1: The tool supports HEX, RGB, HSL, and CSS rgba() formats. All values update in real-time as you pick a color.
faq.q2: Can I enter a specific HEX code?
faq.a2: Yes, you can type a HEX code directly in the input field and all other formats will update automatically.
faq.a3: Yes, the color picker is fully responsive and works on mobile devices with touch-friendly controls.

qr-code.name: QR Code Generator
qr-code.description: Generate custom QR codes from text or URLs

seo.title: Free Online QR Code Generator
seo.content: Generate custom QR codes from any text or URL directly in your browser. Customize colors, size, and error correction level. Download as PNG. Free, no registration required.

faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: You can encode any text, URL, email address, phone number, WiFi credentials, or any string up to about 4,000 characters depending on the error correction level.
faq.q2: What are the error correction levels?
faq.a2: Error correction allows QR codes to be read even if partially damaged. Low (7%), Medium (15%), Quartile (25%), and High (30%) offer increasing levels of redundancy.
faq.a3: Yes, you can set both foreground and background colors. Make sure there is enough contrast for scanners to read the code reliably.

ui.generateError: Failed to generate QR code. Please check your input.

hex-rgb.name: HEX/RGB Converter
hex-rgb.description: Convert colors between HEX and RGB formats

url-encoder.name: URL Encoder
url-encoder.description: Encode and decode URLs and parameters

timestamp.name: Timestamp Converter
timestamp.description: Convert Unix timestamps to readable dates and vice versa

youtube-thumbnail.name: YouTube Thumbnail Downloader
youtube-thumbnail.description: Download YouTube video thumbnails in high quality

seo.title: Free YouTube Thumbnail Downloader
seo.content: Download YouTube video thumbnails in all available resolutions. Paste a YouTube URL and save HD, SD, HQ or MQ thumbnails. Free, instant, no registration needed.

faq.a1: Thumbnails are available in HD (1280x720), SD (640x480), HQ (480x360), and MQ (320x180). Not all resolutions may be available for every video.
faq.q2: Do I need to be logged in to YouTube?
faq.a2: No. Thumbnails are publicly accessible for all YouTube videos. Simply paste the video URL and download the resolution you need.
faq.q3: What YouTube URL formats are supported?
faq.a3: The tool supports standard youtube.com/watch URLs, youtu.be short links, YouTube Shorts URLs, and embed URLs. You can also paste just the video ID.

ui.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid YouTube URL or video ID.

youtube-transcript.name: YouTube Transcript
youtube-transcript.description: Extract subtitles and transcripts from YouTube videos
